page.title: 20"Donkey"
page.content: To play Donkey you need two or more players.You have a ball and throw it at a wall - let it bounce and jump - the person behind is supposed to catch it.If they don't,they get a "D".If the next one fails they get a "D" also.This goes on to the end of the line.The next time round they get an"O".The game goes on like this until one person has "DONKEY", then they are out. "SEVENTIES" This game needs a ball and a wall.We start with SEVEN throw, catch;then SIX throw,bounce,catch.FIVE bounce, catch. FOUR-slamsy... ,THREE- under leg...TWO -clapsy....ONE -turn around...Then we do all that in --one hand,baby,winsy,hopsy and last of all one eye.One person carries on until they drop the ball.Then another person tries until the end of the catches.
